name: Rumble Runners
description:
Rumble Runners is a competitive runner racing game through infinite space where you can race over a randomly generated track with each round you play. Along the way you can come across power-ups and special path pieces that can help you reach the end first or sent you flying straight off the track.
With the added Character Customization and Section Creator, you can customize your experience even more!

Rumble Runners is now in Early Access, expected a wider release near the end of 2021.

Section Creator

Each random generated track uses "Sections" to build with. With the Section Creator you can build your own Sections and setup special behaviors for the path pieces in it!
To ensure every player can reach the end, there are some limitations in place. This way, there is less of a chance a naughty Host will make it harder for the other Party Members to reach the end and secure a cheap victory for themselves!

Randomly Generating Race Tracks

Each and every match is completely randomly generated. Every power-up is randomly spawned in the same manner, making each and every time you play a new round a new experience! Even the Host doesn't have total control over how the Track is being generated, which ensures that every player has a disadvantage.
With the RNG aspect to this mechanic, everyone has to rely on their skill, reflexes and their luck!
